comment.body:
@Yuki2718 Sorry, can you take a look? Looks like most of these are self-promotion? I checked on

```
https://xissmie.xfolio.jp/@totyuu89
https://nijimiss.moe/@Seunun
```

and the links of the banners are

```
https://xfolio.jp/en/portfolio/blic
https://subscription.nijimiss.app/
https://forum.nijimiss.org/
```

---

Oh, this one is indeed ads: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/221114

Maybe each site needs a separate scriptlet and exclude by the target URL, but I'm not sure if `json-prune` has that capability or not.
